name: Gloop (pilotInPyjamas)
description:
Turn into a hybrid by absorbing your enemies!

You will need a modern browser to play the HTML version of this game. Click the game view to register the keyboard.

Gloop is a platformer completed (to this stage) in the month of November. Godot was first opened on November 2nd. All of the visual assets are original, but the music and sound effects were borrowed.

Github: https://github.com/andymac-2/gloop

Controls:

  • Z: Jump/select
  • X: Action/use enemy power
  • Arrow Keys: move
  • Down: absorb an enemy
